title: So, i am playing top lane, and i get my opponent to like 1/10 hp,
body:
he is fizz and has trickster so he thinks he's safe to farm, i ping gragas basically saying hey, there's a guy here that's low, jump in and barrel him for a free kill, 

the guy stops, calls me a retard for needing help so early on, when i'm offering him a free kill, and a strategic play that will help us win

why do these people log in at all? how are you choosing to play a videogame while angry, and staying angry? isn't the point to have fun?
